1: וַיַּעֲשׂ֧וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did</n> בְנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>And the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> הָרַ֖ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> בְּעֵינֵ֣י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in the sight</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וַיִּתְּנֵ֧ם <sup>5414 </sup> <n>delivered</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>them into the hand</n> מִדְיָ֖ן <sup>4080 </sup> <n>of Midian</n> שֶׁ֥בַע <sup>7651 </sup> <n>seven</n> שָׁנִֽים׃ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n>
2: וַתָּ֥עָז <sup>5810 </sup> <n>prevailed</n> יַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>And the hand</n> מִדְיָ֖ן <sup>4080 </sup> <n>of Midian</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>against Israel</n> מִפְּנֵ֨י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>[and] because</n> מִדְיָ֜ן <sup>4080 </sup> <n>of the Midianites</n> עָשֽׂוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>made</n> לָהֶ֣ם ׀ בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמִּנְהָרוֹת֙ <sup>4492 </sup> <n>them the dens</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בֶּֽהָרִ֔ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>which [are] in the mountains</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמְּעָר֖וֹת <sup>4631 </sup> <n>and caves</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמְּצָדֽוֹת׃ <sup>4679 </sup> <n>and strong holds</n>
3: וְהָיָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>it was</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>when</n> זָרַ֣ע <sup>2232 </sup> <n>had sown</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>And [so] it was when Israel</n> וְעָלָ֨ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>came up</n> מִדְיָ֧ן <sup>4080 </sup> <n>that the Midianites</n> וַֽעֲמָלֵ֛ק <sup>6002 </sup> <n>and the Amalekites</n> וּבְנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and the children</n> קֶ֖דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>of the east</n> וְעָל֥וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>even they came up</n> עָלָֽיו׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n>
4: וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <sup>2583 </sup> <n>And they encamped</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וַיַּשְׁחִ֙יתוּ֙ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>against them and destroyed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְב֣וּל <sup>2981 </sup> <n>the increase</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>thou</n> בּוֹאֲךָ֖ <sup>935 </sup> <n>till thou come</n> עַזָּ֑ה <sup>5804 </sup> <n>unto Gaza</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יַשְׁאִ֤ירוּ <sup>7604 </sup> <n>and left</n> מִֽחְיָה֙ <sup>4241 </sup> <n>no sustenance</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>for Israel</n> וְשֶׂ֥ה <sup>7716 </sup> <n>neither sheep</n> וָשׁ֖וֹר <sup>7794 </sup> <n>nor ox</n> וַחֲמֽוֹר׃ <sup>2543 </sup> <n>nor ass</n>
5: כִּ֡י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הֵם֩ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>with</n> וּמִקְנֵיהֶ֨ם <sup>4735 </sup> <n>with their cattle</n> יַעֲל֜וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>For they came up</n> וְאָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>168 </sup> <n>and their tents</n> [יָבֹאוּ כ] (וּבָ֤אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> ק) כְדֵֽי־ <sup>1767 </sup> <n>as</n> אַרְבֶּה֙ <sup>697 </sup> <n>grasshoppers</n> לָרֹ֔ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>for multitude</n> וְלָהֶ֥ם וְלִגְמַלֵּיהֶ֖ם <sup>1581 </sup> <n>[for] both they and their camels</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>were without</n> מִסְפָּ֑ר <sup>4557 </sup> <n>were without number</n> וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and they entered</n> בָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>into the land</n> לְשַׁחֲתָֽהּ׃ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>to destroy</n>
6: וַיִּדַּ֧ל <sup>1809 </sup> <n>impoverished</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>And Israel</n> מְאֹ֖ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>was greatly</n> מִפְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>because</n> מִדְיָ֑ן <sup>4080 </sup> <n>of the Midianites</n> וַיִּזְעֲק֥וּ <sup>2199 </sup> <n>cried</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> פ
7: וַיְהִ֕י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> זָעֲק֥וּ <sup>2199 </sup> <n>cried</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> עַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> אֹד֥וֹת <sup>182 </sup> <n>because</n> מִדְיָֽן׃ <sup>4080 </sup> <n>of the Midianites</n>
8: וַיִּשְׁלַ֧ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>That the LORD</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>a</n> נָבִ֖יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>prophet</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>which said</n> לָהֶ֜ם כֹּה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto them Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אָנֹכִ֞י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> הֶעֱלֵ֤יתִי <sup>5927 </sup> <n>I brought you up</n> אֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>from Egypt</n> וָאֹצִ֥יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and brought you forth</n> אֶתְכֶ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> מִבֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>out of the house</n> עֲבָדִֽים׃ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>of bondage</n>
9: וָאַצִּ֤ל <sup>5337 </sup> <n>And I delivered</n> אֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> מִיַּ֣ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>you out of the hand</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4713 </sup> <n>Egyptian</n> וּמִיַּ֖ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>and out of the hand</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> לֹחֲצֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>3905 </sup> <n>of all that oppressed</n> וָאֲגָרֵ֤שׁ <sup>1644 </sup> <n>you and drave them out</n> אוֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from before</n> וָאֶתְּנָ֥ה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>you and gave</n> לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַרְצָֽם׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>you their land</n>
10: וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>And I said</n> לָכֶ֗ם אֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto you I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִֽירְאוּ֙ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>fear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>not the gods</n> הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <sup>567 </sup> <n>of the Amorites</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whose</n> אַתֶּ֖ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> יוֹשְׁבִ֣ים <sup>3427 </sup> <n>ye dwell</n> בְּאַרְצָ֑ם <sup>776 </sup> <n>in whose land</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <sup>8085 </sup> <n>but ye have not obeyed</n> בְּקוֹלִֽי׃ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>my voice</n> פ
11: וַיָּבֹ֞א <sup>935 </sup> <n>And there came</n> מַלְאַ֣ךְ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>an angel</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and sat</n> תַּ֤חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> הָֽאֵלָה֙ <sup>424 </sup> <n>under an oak</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בְּעָפְרָ֔ה <sup>6084 </sup> <n>which [was] in Ophrah</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לְיוֹאָ֖שׁ <sup>3101 </sup> <n>that [pertained] unto Joash</n> אֲבִ֣י הָֽעֶזְרִ֑י <sup>33 </sup> <n>the Abiezrite</n> וְגִדְע֣וֹן <sup>1439 </sup> <n>Gideon</n> בְּנ֗וֹ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and his son</n> חֹבֵ֤ט <sup>2251 </sup> <n>threshed</n> חִטִּים֙ <sup>2406 </sup> <n>wheat</n> בַּגַּ֔ת <sup>1660 </sup> <n>by the winepress</n> לְהָנִ֖יס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>to hide</n> מִפְּנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>[it] from</n> מִדְיָֽן׃ <sup>4080 </sup> <n>the Midianites</n>
12: וַיֵּרָ֥א <sup>7200 </sup> <n>appeared</n> אֵלָ֖יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> מַלְאַ֣ךְ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>And the angel</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto him and said</n> אֵלָ֔יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto him The LORD</n> עִמְּךָ֖ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> גִּבּ֥וֹר <sup>1368 </sup> <n>[is] with thee thou mighty</n> הֶחָֽיִל׃ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>man of valour</n>

30: וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אַנְשֵׁ֤י <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> הָעִיר֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>unto</n> יוֹאָ֔שׁ <sup>3101 </sup> <n>unto Joash</n> הוֹצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>Bring out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּנְךָ֖ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>thy son</n> וְיָמֹ֑ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that he may die</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>and indeed</n> נָתַץ֙ <sup>5422 </sup> <n>because he hath cast down</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִזְבַּ֣ח <sup>4196 </sup> <n>the altar</n> הַבַּ֔עַל <sup>1168 </sup> <n>of Baal</n> וְכִ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>and indeed</n> כָרַ֖ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and because he hath cut down</n> הָאֲשֵׁרָ֥ה <sup>842 </sup> <n>the grove</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָלָֽיו׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>was beside</n>

32: וַיִּקְרָא־ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>he called</n> ל֥וֹ בַיּוֹם־ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>Therefore on that day</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>him</n> יְרֻבַּ֣עַל <sup>3378 </sup> <n>him Jerubbaal</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> יָ֤רֶב <sup>7378 </sup> <n>plead</n> בּוֹ֙ הַבַּ֔עַל <sup>1168 </sup> <n>Let Baal</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> נָתַ֖ץ <sup>5422 </sup> <n>against him because he hath thrown down</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִזְבְּחֽוֹ׃ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>his altar</n> פ
33: וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מִדְיָ֧ן <sup>4080 </sup> <n>Then all the Midianites</n> וַעֲמָלֵ֛ק <sup>6002 </sup> <n>and the Amalekites</n> וּבְנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and the children</n> קֶ֖דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>of the east</n> נֶאֶסְפ֣וּ <sup>622 </sup> <n>were gathered</n> יַחְדָּ֑ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> וַיַּעַבְר֥וּ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>and went over</n> וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <sup>2583 </sup> <n>and pitched</n> בְּעֵ֥מֶק <sup>6010 </sup> <n>in the valley</n> יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <sup>3157 </sup> <n>of Jezreel</n>

37: הִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> אָנֹכִ֗י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מַצִּ֛יג <sup>3322 </sup> <n>Behold I will put</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גִּזַּ֥ת <sup>1492 </sup> <n>a fleece</n> הַצֶּ֖מֶר <sup>6785 </sup> <n>of wool</n> בַּגֹּ֑רֶן <sup>1637 </sup> <n>in the floor</n> אִ֡ם <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> טַל֩ <sup>2919 </sup> <n>[and] if the dew</n> יִהְיֶ֨ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הַגִּזָּ֜ה <sup>1492 </sup> <n>be on the fleece</n> לְבַדָּ֗הּ <sup>905 </sup> <n>only</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon all the earth</n> חֹ֔רֶב <sup>2721 </sup> <n>only and [it be] dry</n> וְיָדַעְתִּ֗י <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[beside] then shall I know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> תוֹשִׁ֧יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>that thou wilt save</n> בְּיָדִ֛י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>by mine hand</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>as thou hast said</n>
38: וַיְהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and it was</n> כֵ֕ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> וַיַּשְׁכֵּם֙ <sup>7925 </sup> <n>And it was so for he rose up early</n> מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <sup>4283 </sup> <n>on the morrow</n> וַיָּ֖זַר <sup>2115 </sup> <n>together</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַגִּזָּ֑ה <sup>1492 </sup> <n>the fleece</n> וַיִּ֤מֶץ <sup>4680 </sup> <n>and wringed</n> טַל֙ <sup>2919 </sup> <n>the dew</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַגִּזָּ֔ה <sup>1492 </sup> <n>out of the fleece</n> מְל֥וֹא <sup>4393 </sup> <n>full</n> הַסֵּ֖פֶל <sup>5602 </sup> <n>a bowl</n> מָֽיִם׃ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>of water</n>
39: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> גִּדְעוֹן֙ <sup>1439 </sup> <n>And Gideon</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto God</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> יִ֤חַר <sup>2734 </sup> <n>be hot</n> אַפְּךָ֙ <sup>639 </sup> <n>Let not thine anger</n> בִּ֔י וַאֲדַבְּרָ֖ה <sup>1696 </sup> <n>against me and I will speak</n> אַ֣ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>also</n> הַפָּ֑עַם <sup>6471 </sup> <n>but this once</n> אֲנַסֶּ֤ה <sup>5254 </sup> <n>let me prove</n> נָּא־ <sup>4994 </sup> <n>please</n> רַק־ <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> הַפַּ֙עַם֙ <sup>6471 </sup> <n>I pray thee but this once</n> בַּגִּזָּ֔ה <sup>1492 </sup> <n>with the fleece</n> יְהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> נָ֨א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> חֹ֤רֶב <sup>2721 </sup> <n>let it now be dry</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> הַגִּזָּה֙ <sup>1492 </sup> <n>only upon the fleece</n> לְבַדָּ֔הּ <sup>905 </sup> <n>only</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and upon all the ground</n> יִֽהְיֶה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> טָּֽל׃ <sup>2919 </sup> <n>let there be dew</n>
